NAME: First Aid
DESCRIPTION: Perform an improvised healing on yourself.

NAME: Intimidate
DESCRIPTION: Intimidate the enemy and lowers their attack.

NAME: Rushed Strike
DESCRIPTION: Perform a rushed attack on an enemy, lowers your attack.

NAME: Fortify
DESCRIPTION: Fortify yourself and raise your defense.

NAME: Small Fireball
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy.

NAME: Whirlwind
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of wind damage to an enemy.

NAME: Quickflame
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy. Does not skip the turn.

NAME: Ice Bolt
DESCRIPTION: Deal ice damage to an enemy and has a chance to freeze them.

NAME: Hyperbeam
DESCRIPTION: Perform a highly damage blow, but debuffs yourself.

NAME: Bloodstealer
DESCRIPTION: Drain health from your enemy's blood.
